title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Alviso, California
content:
Photo submitted by Carlos Martinez, “3 day weekend ride out in Baylands, near Alviso, California, on the Asperos.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here. *Please note that […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Alviso, California appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
